title: I have been permabanned yet RIOT refuses to hear my side.
body:
I saved a brand's life but he refused to thank me despite telling me this. He used some choice words yet I won't be surprised if Riot didn't ban him. Yes my chat included curse words but so does nearly every chat in league history.  Brand threatened me and I guess his threat worked. Riot never cared to give me a warning at all, not even a chat ban. Just a permament ban after the first time.  I find this too harsh and I wish i can contact a Riot employee besides the receptionist. 

Mushroom26

replies.body:
> I wish i can contact a Riot employee

Hi

> Riot never cared to give me a warning at all, not even a chat ban.

You had a 14-day ban about a month ago. The reform card on your 14-day ban informed you that the next penalty would be a perma-ban.

> Brand threatened me and I guess his threat worked.

You cite the actions of a Brand. But, as shown in your reform card, you were not banned for a single game.

You use frequent hate speech and harassment. You try to trick the system by misspelling things, and using spaces. I'm guessing this is why you have not posted your chat logs. If you have honestly read the provided chat logs and are still confused, please post them here and I'm happy to highlight what would be zero-tolerance and other elements that are unacceptable.

> Hi

It was at this point Mushroom26 knew... he fucked up

Ok ok I reread my chat and it was pretty awful. I admit I'm still butthurt about it but I did agree to abide by the rules and I broke that contract so fair enough. I still hate that brand tho and he called me %%%g.t and he's probably not banned for that but 2 wrongs don't make a right and I acknowledge that and I will take the L. 

That said that "Hi" was pretty bad ass and I respect you guys for abiding by your code.

The other commentators are hyping this up but it was all in good fun I guess. 

Anyways I forgot about the 14 day ban but it's cool. Your game your rules.

Thanks for the response.

Does anyone else think it's odd that someone would like about their chat logs or behavior in game when it can be easily discovered by Riot what the truth happens to be?

My guess is that your saying of "he refused to thank me" means you were pestering, pushing, and then downright offensive back. Regardless what punishment the other player received, from the way the statement is phrased, it was likely a reasonable ban.

Logs or GTFO. Ban was probably deserved, since permbans are very rarely given without previous warnings.

You ignored the warnings. Maybe now you will realize that actions do have consequences and you cant just keep ignoring warnings.
